document_data.name: Chant Morven
document_data.mainbody: '''Chant Morven''' was a portly human pawnbroker with a shop in one of [[Airspur|Airspur's]] seedier districts.  In spite of his large size, he was unusually nimble and quick on his feet. Chant owed a large gambling debt to [[Raneger]], a local crime lord.
document_data.Equipment: Chant had a magical hand crossbow that fired three darts at once.{{Cite digital book/Spinner of Lies|1549}}
document_data.Relationships: Chant was close friends with Demascus and Riltana. He had a frosty relationship with his son whom he felt resented him.{{Cite digital book/Spinner of Lies|1121}}
